metadata.title: USN-5745-1 -- shadow vulnerability
metadata.description: Florian Weimer discovered that shadow was not properly copying and removing user directory trees, which could lead to a race condition. A local attacker could possibly use this issue to setup a symlink attack and alter or remove directories without authorization.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5745-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  passwd - 1:4.8.1-1ubuntu5.20.04.3 login - 1:4.8.1-1ubuntu5.20.04.3 uidmap - 1:4.8.1-1ubuntu5.20.04.3 No subscription required
